#SamsungBiologics #BIODigital #BIO2021 #CDMO

items.title: Samsung Biologics Plant 4: Operational Excellence
items.description:
https://samsungbiologics.com/
We have a proven track of reliability and world-class client satisfaction. Thanks to our focus on operational excellence, we're able to fulfill our clients' needs rapidly while maintaining a steady performance across all plants. Our Plant 4 is no exception. Soon to be the world's largest manufacturing facility at a single site, it will cement our position as one of biopharma's leading service providers.

#Biologics #BioManufacturing #CDMO

items.title: 삼성바이오로직스 제4공장 "수퍼플랜트"를 소개합니다.
items.description:
삼성바이오로직스의 제 4공장은 단일 공장 세계 최대 생산의 기록을 자체 경신하고 세포주 개발부터 완제 생산까지 한 공장 안에서 One-stop Service가 가능한 “수퍼 플랜트”로 설계되었습니다.

제4공장의 비전과 특장점을 비롯하여 완공까지의 건설 과정을 생생하게 전달하기 위해, Virtual Showroom을 오픈하였습니다. 

바로 지금 삼성바이오로직스 제4공장 Virtual Showroom을 방문하셔서 바이오 업계를 선도하는 삼성바이오로직스의 미래를 확인하세요.

www.samsungbiologics.com/plant4/kr

items.title: [V-Log] 삼성바이오로직스 JOB 돋보기│공정개발: 배양편

바이오의약품 생산 현장에서는 어떤 일을 하는지 궁금하다면?

items.title: Our Story : Driven. For Flexibility.
items.description: Since the emergence of the COVID-19 virus and other new life-threatening diseases, it is important for us to be as adaptable as possible in responding to the development and manufacturing needs of our clients. As a Senior Engineer on the Drug Product Operations team, Rahyun Park sees flexibility as an integral part of her job. Hear how being flexible allows her team to avoid risks, while creating an integrated drug product line.

items.title: Resilient and Sustainable Eco-system of Biotherapeutics
items.description:
Samsung Biologics is headquartered in Incheon, Korea, a globally-competitive biocluster, delivering biopharmaceuticals to more than 25 countries. As the leading CDMO, we drive innovation to deliver resilient and sustainable supply chain eco-system together with our global suppliers.
To learn more about our unique strengths, please follow our channel or visit our website at www.samsungbiologics.com

items.description: Samsung Biologics thrives on delivering life-saving solutions and quality biomedicines. In this new #NaturesBuildingBlocks series, produced by BBC StoryWorks, we show how we, as a leading global CDMO, rose to the challenge, matching the speed and scale of the pandemic to provide solutions and save lives.

items.title: How COVID-19 is Redefining Drug Development & Manufacturing | Festival of Biologics
items.description:
Unprecedented challenging time also provides opportunities for a great advancement of innovation with cooperation. In this session, learn about
- Close collaboration and communication with all stakeholders, utilizing the latest technology, establishing a robust business contingency plan, and eliminating a lead time to deliver drugs on time stably
- Accelerate timelines by streamlining the process
- Few case studies of our innovation to deliver drugs in just 3 months and how Samsung Biologics goes the extra mile

items.title: How we expedite supply of COVID-19 Vaccines
items.description: As a fully integrated CDMO, we are committed to helping our clients provide quality treatments and vaccines to all those in need around the world. Through speed, quality and efficiency, we are working tirelessly to expedite the supply of COVID-19 vaccines using the latest innovative technology, multi-scale capacities, and reliable supply chain networks.

items.title: End-to-end CDMO Service | Tools, Technologies, and Scientific Insights
Our Story: Driven. For Client Satisfaction.
items.description:
Whether promoting the company’s future Plant 4 capabilities or how our teams use their advanced expertise to seamlessly meet every need, our Global Sales Operations Center introduces clients to the end-to-end, innovative services we offer. But their ultimate focus is satisfaction. As a Sales Group Leader, Peter Lee discusses how our integrated business model can unlock the potential and value in every part of the client experience.

#SamsungBiologics #ClientSatisfaction #DrivenForLife

items.title: Samsung Biologics Plant 4: Construction Strengths
items.description:
https://samsungbiologics.com/
Leveraging our in-house engineering, procurement, and validation experience, Plant 4 is our most ambitious project to date. This facility will optimize our strengths, including speed, project management, and flexibility, to the fullest potential to better serve our clients.

#Biologics #BioManufacturing #CDMO

items.title: Samsung Biologics | 10 Years Strong
items.description:
Ten years ago, we started with a singular vision: to enrich people's lives through technology and innovation. Since then, we've achieved exponential growth and delivered breakthrough innovations, creating an impact around the world. Driven to discover, develop, and manufacture breakthrough solutions to save lives—we commemorate this day and look forward to the next decade to come.

Visit our website to download the 10th Anniversary brochure where you can discover all we've accomplished and see what we have in store for the future.

#SamsungBiologics #10YearsStrong #DrivenForLife #CDMO

items.title: Continued Technical Innovation for Client Satisfaction
items.description:
As an innovation-driven CDMO, our mission is to continuously better our strengths with our clients first in mind. At Samsung Biologics, we incorporate unique approaches to technology and facility design to maximize production flexibility and productivity to meet our client's needs.

To learn more about our innovative approaches, please follow our channel or visit us at www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Introducing Biosafety Testing at Samsung Biologics
items.description:
Comprehensive and precise, our Biosafety Testing service can support you in reaching your milestones, ensuring on-time, high-quality delivery to patients worldwide. As a one-stop CDMO partner, we do all testing in-house resulting in stable product releases for sample traveling, while maintaining a client-driven approach to provide superior levels of biosafety testing through close communication and 24/7 accessibility. 

#SamsungBiologics #CDMO #DrivenForLife #BiosafetyTesting

items.title: Seahee Kim | Principal Scientist in Cell Line Development
items.description: Our Principal Scientist Seahee Kim describes her calm but steadfast approach to managing projects step by step - just like her mentor, another woman leader in the industry. Wrapping up this #WomensHistoryMonth, hear more from Seahee in this video clip and learn how she is making history at Samsung Biologics.

items.title: BIO Digital 2020 | BioProcess Insider Interview
items.description: Kevin Sharp, Senior Director of Business Development at Samsung Biologics, sat down with Bioprocess Insider editor Dan Stanton to discuss the company's agile response to the COVID-19 pandemic, the evolving role of the outsourcing manufacturing organization, and their future expansion plans.

items.title: Benefits and Amenities at Samsung Biologics | People Matter
items.description:
Life at Samsung Biologics is more than just work. We value people and that is our way of doing business. We are committed to building a better and healthier world for all.

If you want to know more about us, visit our website: https://www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Samsung Biologics Virtual Exhibition
items.description:
Please visit: https://exhibition.samsungbiologics.com 

Samsung Biologics introduces a Virtual Exhibition site to provide a unique and convenient digital experience. In response to the industry-wide shift to virtual conferences, Samsung Biologics has taken a further step by providing an innovative, virtualized conference experience offering convenience for clients and industry professionals interested in learning more about the company and its services. 

Virtual Exhibition Hall visitors are first welcomed into a reception area where they can become oriented with the platform. The visitors can then digitally explore three main halls (CMO, CDO, CRO) that showcase the company’s capabilities and service offerings with informative video clips and interactive content. A Resource Library is also available to access additional information or schedule one-on-one meetings. The Samsung Biologics Virtual Exhibition Hall is highly intuitive, and optimized for both desktop and mobile devices and leverages a global cloud infrastructure to ensure speed and accessibility for users from any worldwide location.

items.title: Samsung Biologics | Our Vision, 10 Years in the Making
items.description:
A decade of dedication. For a future of infinite possibilities. 

#SamsungBiologics #DrivenForLife #CDMO #10YearsStrong

items.title: Samsung Biologics | Supply Chain Management
items.description: In light of the COVID-19 pandemic, building a resilient supply chain is now more important than ever. At Samsung Biologics, we believe maintaining stable supply and meeting the evolving needs of clients is key to securing steady business continuity. Please watch the video and learn from Kyoung Lim, Senior Director of Supply Chain Management at Samsung Biologics, on how we manage our robust supply chain management to prepare for any unprecedented crisis.

items.title: Drug Product Manufacturing: Unmatched Throughput & Flexibility
items.description: With a high production capacity, client-first mindset, reliable track record, and expedited batch release, our Drug Product Manufacturing and Aseptic Fill-Finish Capability are unmatched in throughput and flexibility. Connect with us to learn more about our end-to-end CDMO services.

items.title: Samsung Biologics 3P Innovation
items.description: What is" Better Life"? At Samsung Biologics, we explore this question every day as part of our innovation principles. By continuously innovating our People, Process and Portfolio, we will fulfill our vision to become the most trusted partner to our clients working together to achieve a "Better Life" for humanity through biomedicines with innovation and technology. To learn more, visit our website at www.samsungbiologics.com #BetterLife

items.title: Driven. For Life.
items.description:
We are determined and resolute in our purpose: to be always dynamic, always responsible, and always innovative. It's in our DNA and it’s a part of who we are.
This isn’t just a job—it’s a calling we’ve dedicated our lives to. At Samsung Biologics, we're constantly inspired and driven to enrich human lives. 

#DrivenForLife

items.title: Small Scale Manufacturing Capabilities at Samsung Biologics
items.description: At Samsung Biologics, our goal is to satisfy clients of varying sizes and needs. This week we celebrated the mechanical completion of our single-use mammalian cell culture drug substance facility with 1K bioreactor designed to produce clinical to commercial drugs. This new facility is expected to be cGMP ready in 2Q 2020 and provide greater process flexibility while continuing to maintain our world-class reliability and quality.

items.title: Accelerated Tech Transfer from Development to Manufacturing for a COVID-19 Program | BPI West
items.description: The devastating effects wrought by the COVID-19 pandemic can only be mitigated by the rapid development and manufacture of vaccines and neutralizing antibodies. However, tech transfer remains a critical, time-consuming step on the path towards large-scale production of therapeutics in such times of crisis. Here we describe the acceleration of tech transfer to enable kickoff to vial thaw for antibody manufacture within three months for a clinical program and within five months for a process qualification campaign. We demonstrate various approaches to reduce the timeline from development to manufacturing at a 15kL scale. We also discuss the implications of this work towards enabling a rapid response to future pandemics, as well as introducing routine accelerated tech transfer to our site.

items.title: Samsung Biologics | Better Future for Humanity
items.description:
At Samsung Biologics, we envision building a better future together with our clients. This vision is what drives us to empower breakthroughs to help patients all around the globe. With our leading expertise and capabilities, Samsung Biologics promises to give our clients endless opportunities and potential that give lasting impact to bring the future we all want to live in.

To learn more about our promises, follow our channel or visit us at www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Our Story: Driven. For Inclusion.
items.description: For #InternationalWomensMonth, we're celebrating the remarkable footsteps women have made in global health while recognizing what we do to create an equal workplace. In our employee spotlight series, hear how Eri Kwon, a senior scientist and member of our Bio Women's Club, is helping to build an inclusive environment and better life for all.  #IWD2021 #ChoosetoChallenge

items.title: Key Considerations in Choosing Stainless Steel vs Single Use Bioprocessing
items.description: This presentation will introduce the current competing market between Stainless Steel and Single Use Systems, with a further in-depth analysis of the capabilities and benefits of stainless steel systems. In this presentation, Justin Carbungco, our Group Leader of Manufacturing Operations, will also look into the lessons learned regarding the affect of the COVID-19 pandemic on manufacturing with stainless steel and single use systems.

Learn more from our SVP & Chief Quality Officer Sam MacHour who shared Samsung Biologics' vision for the future at this year's Biomanufacturing World Summit.

items.title: Jo Beth DeFreitas | Principal Specialist & Team Leader in QA
items.description: Jo Beth DeFreitas, our QA Team Leader, was most influenced by a past co-worker who coached her when she started her first job fresh out of school, almost 20 years ago. Just as how she was helped by another woman in building her career, Jo Beth enjoys mentoring and helping others to see their success and exceed their own expectations. Hear more about how she is shaping history at Samsung Biologics in this video clip. #WomensHistoryMonth

items.title: Samsung Biologics’ Virtual Exhibition Hall wins Best Digital Campaign award
items.description: Samsung Biologics' Virtual Exhibition Hall won the Best Digital Campaign award for its ingenuity and creativity in the biopharma space during Digital Pharma Innovation Week. It was recognized for its highly interactive digital capabilities and virtual reality (VR) technology to connect with clients around the world. Blending realistic details from the Company's existing VIP exhibition room and physical facilities, the advanced solution allows users to explore its CDO, CMO, and CRO services from any device, anywhere in the world.

items.title: Samsung Biologics launched its proprietary cell line, S-CHOice.
items.description:
S-CHOice builds on glutamine synthase (GS) knock-out Chinese hamster ovary (CHO) cell line technology and shows improved titers up to two-fold from industry average, reaching above 7 g/L for standard monoclonal antibodies. The cell line also shows enhanced cell viability with over 90% at day-21 in a fed-batch study, demonstrating effectiveness in producing high-quality cell lines.

Check out how our new proprietary cell line, S-CHOice, allows us to serve our CDO clients in bringing their molecule faster and better to market and ultimately into the hands of patients.

items.title: #덕분에챌린지 "의료진 여러분, 감사합니다 그리고 존경합니다" - 삼성바이오로직스 | Thanks to Challenge - Samsung Biologics
items.description:
코로나19의 최전선에서 싸우고 있는 모든 의료진들을 위해♥
#덕분에챌린지 

코로나19가 장기화되면서 모든 이들에게 힘겨운 시간이 지속되고 있습니다.
삼성바이오로직스는 의료진 여러분들의 헌신과 노고에 진심으로 감사드리며, 어려움을 극복하고 계신 모든 분들에게 위로와 응원의 마음을 전달하고자 합니다.

어려운 환경에서도 글로벌 비즈니스 교류에 힘쓰는 인천경제자유구역청(IFEZ)에 좋은 뜻을 함께 이어갈 동참의 의지를 전합니다. 
#덕분에챌린지 #의료진덕분에 #덕분에캠페인

To all doctors, nurses and medical workers at the forefront of the country's fight against COVID-19, thank you. 

These are challenging and stressful times for everyone.
At Samsung Biologics, we are deeply thankful for the continued hard work, dedication and professionalism of the front-line contributors who are working tirelessly to tackle COVID-19 crisis.

We will continue to offer our full support in improving society's health and wellness to fight this together. 

Samsung Biologics passes on this honor to IFEZ (Incheon Free Economic Zone Authority) to participate in this giving thanks relay. 

To learn more about the latest ways Samsung Biologics is responding to COVID-19, visit our website at https://samsungbiologics.com/front/en/mediaCenter/covid19_resources.do

items.title: [Full] CPhI WW 2019 | Speaker Session #3 | Selecting The Right CDMO
items.description: This presentation describes considerations for CDMO selection to help determine the right partner. Samsung Biologics' fully integrated CDMO capabilities including product development, manufacturing and testing services with focus on client partnerships to accelerate timelines whilst providing quality services and solutions. Samsung Biologics' partnership model provides flexibility to meet client requirements for phase appropriate manufacturing and testing and builds on a successful track record.

items.title: Dennis Lee - Lead Scientist in the QC Team at Samsung Biologics
items.description: Dennis Lee is a Lead Scientist in the QC team at Samsung Biologics. "My personal goal is to take every opportunity to learn, grow, and take on new challenges." Hear his story about working at Samsung Biologics, and enter our Talent Pool at https://www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Interview with The Korea Society: Vaccine Cooperation
items.description:
Demand for bio-medicines in a rapidly changing global environment is increasing day by day. Amid growing global interest in the COVID-19 vaccine as a critical key to ending the pandemic, Samsung Biologics drew attention from both the media and the industry for its recent agreement for the fill-finish manufacturing of Moderna’s COVID-19 vaccine.
 
Recently, John Rim, CEO of Samsung Biologics, had an interview with Thomas Byrne, President and CEO of The Korea Society, a nonprofit organization that aims to promote greater awareness, mutual understanding, and cooperation between the U.S. and South Korea.

The Korea Society’s “President's Interview Series” particularly explores the economic, financial, and business relations between South Korea and the U.S. In addition to sharing the current outlook of the pharmaceutical industry, CEO John Rim discussed Samsung Biologics' capabilities to manufacture mRNA vaccines, its role in the ongoing pandemic as a leading global CDMO, and its future growth vision.

To watch the full interview, please click on the video below.

#SamsungBiologics #DrivenForLife #COVID #vaccines

items.description:
창립 10주년 X 사내작가단
'너에게 꽃을 보낸다'

창립 10주년을 기념해, 
삼성바이오로직스 사내작가단이 특별한 '마음 전달 이벤트'를 준비했습니다.

감사한 마음, 소중한 마음, 응원의 마음을 담은
동료의 메시지와 깜짝 선물 덕분에, 

삼성바이오로직스 임직원들의 마음에도 
웃음꽃이 활짝 핀 하루였습니다. :D 💐

items.title: Innov-daptation: Shifting Challenges to Opportunity in Bio Manufacturing | Next Pharma (Next NORMAL)
items.description: A key strategy for achieving a successful biomanufacturing business highly depends on agile operation and transparency across the value chain. Preparing for digital transformation in advance can eliminate possible risks when faced with unexpected crises. Samsung Biologics quickly enabled innov-daptation (digital transformation) to overcome various challenges amid the pandemic. In this session, learn more about Samsung Biologics’ innovative efforts of digital transformation to enhance data integrity and process innovation to achieve client satisfaction.

items.title: Samsung Biologics Global Internship Recruitment
items.description:
The Samsung Biologics Global Internship program is designed to provide direct and hands-on work experience for those interested in pursuing a career in the bio industry. Check out how our interns have transformed, growing as future leaders of an up-and-coming industry. To learn more, visit our website https://bit.ly/39eZ7fv 

#BetterLife by Samsung Biologics.

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.

items.title: [V-Log] 삼성바이오로직스 JOB 돋보기│공정/개발 : PM 편
items.description: 기술이전부터 생산, 허가까지 통합관리하는 삼성바이오로직스 PM (Project Management)팀. PM 직무의 일과와 필수 역량까지 알차게 전하는 PM팀 김수민 프로의 하루를 만나보세요!

items.title: BIO Digital 2020 | Get to IND Faster: Accelerated & High Performance Cell Line Development
items.description:
Expediting a development timeline is directly related to obtaining IND clearance and starting your Phase 1 Study faster. At BIO Digital 2020, John Gill, Director of Cell Line Development at Samsung Biologics, describes how you can get to IND faster through our accelerated & high-performance proprietary cell line, S-CHOice. In addition, we present the combined benefit with S-CHOice and a two-step purification platform, which can further expedite the timeline and reduce manufacturing costs.
Our CDO services provide a full scope of development to help our clients reach IND from cell line development, process development, to non-clinical and clinical material manufacturing.

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.

items.title: Samsung Biologics' San Francisco CDO R&D Center Grand Opening
items.description:
Samsung Biologics' San Francisco CDO R&D Center is finally opened in October, 2020. 
As your nextdoor CDO partner, we now provide faster & better development service for your success to IND & BLA with maximum flexibility.

Contact : cdo.business@samsung.com

items.title: Samsung Biologics Plant 4 : Specs & Features
items.description:
https://samsungbiologics.com/
From large-scale manufacturing to smaller batch sizes, Plant 4 is our most flexible facility to date, with a diverse line-up of bioreactors to support clients' varying needs. Watch our video to explore these features, see how we've integrated cyber security and data integrity into our process, and more at a single site.

#Biologics #BioManufacturing #CDMO

items.title: 2021 DCAT Week: Building The Future With Samsung Biologics Plant 4
items.description: Watch our on-demand session from the virtual DCAT Member Company Announcement Forum where Segang Park, our Vice President of Engineering Project Management, EPCV, shared detailed insights about our Plant 4 expansion project.

items.title: 2021년 하반기 삼성바이오로직스 온라인 채용설명회 │ 랜선잡담(LAN線 JOB談) 시즌2
items.description:
Driven. For Better Life, Better Work. 
더 나은, 더 건강한 인류의 삶을 향해 끊임없이 도전하는 삼성바이오로직스. 
삼성바이오로직스와 함께 인류의 더 나은 내일에 기여하고 싶다면?
2021 하반기 온라인 채용설명회 영상을 놓치지 마세요!

※본 자료는 당사의 자산이므로, 해당 영상의 캡처/촬영/녹화 및 불법 공유를 금합니다.

items.title: A Day in The Life of a Samsung Biologics Intern
items.description: Interns play an integral role at Samsung Biologics—they're the innovators-to-be and the passionate newcomers who want to learn from the best while in turn, inspiring us to think outside the box. Our internship program offers a diverse array of learning experiences within various functions across the organization. Watch our video to get a glimpse of what a day looks like for our interns.

items.title: [V-Log] 삼성바이오로직스 JOB 돋보기│공정/개발 : 정제편
items.description: 배양 공정에서 나온 바이오의약품의 원액을 정제하고, 알맞은 농도로 맞추어 최종 DS(Drug Substance) 원액을 제조하는 정제그룹. 완성된 DS원액은 환자에게 투여되어 생명을 살리는 약이기 때문에 ‘업무’가 아니라 ‘책임’을 해내겠다는 마음가짐으로 정제 업무에 임하는 전진광 프로의 하루를 소개합니다!

items.title: [EN] BlueBetterFly "Shaping the Future of Pharma" Event (US)
items.description: BlueBetterFly. An experience completely unique to Samsung Biologics that encompasses our pride and belief that one small change can have a big impact on the future. In our "Shaping the Future of Pharma" virtual networking forum, we hosted a roundtable discussion on the impact of COVID-19 and offered attendees the opportunity to connect and share insights with distinguished industry professionals in the US on the future of biomanufacturing.

items.title: Webinar | Efficiency For Validation "Continuous Change & Improvement"
items.description: In case you missed it, you can now watch our PharmTech webinar. Hear from Ray Cox, our Senior Director of Quality Engineering, will shared insights on how implementing master protocols and risk-based approaches can make the validation process more efficient.

items.title: [Full] CPhI WW 2019 | Speaker Session #1 | Drug Product
items.description: This presentation describes Samsung Biologics’ experience with Drug Product projects in clinical and commercial stages, with clientele ranging from virtual companies to big pharma. Within five years, Samsung Biologics has evolved from a single filling line start-up to an emerging competitor in the DP CDMO landscape. Focused on reinventing the customer experience, Samsung Biologics is determined to deliver where others cannot. Four case studies will be presented illustrating the adaptability and innovation Samsung Biologics has employed to successfully deliver a quality product and maintain their clients’ supply chains consistently and reliably.

items.title: [Highlights] CPhI WW 2019 | Speaker Session #3 | Selecting The Right CDMO
items.description: This presentation describes considerations for CDMO selection to help determine the right partner. Samsung Biologics' fully integrated CDMO capabilities including product development, manufacturing and testing services with focus on client partnerships to accelerate timelines whilst providing quality services and solutions. Samsung Biologics' partnership model provides flexibility to meet client requirements for phase appropriate manufacturing and testing and builds on a successful track record.

items.title: Adam Gibbons - Lead Engineer in the Aseptic Filling Team at Samsung Biologics
items.description:
Adam Gibbons, Lead Engineer in the Aseptic Filling Team, is originally from Southern California. Find out how he's adjusting to his life at Samsung Biologics in this video. 

If you want to know more about us, visit our website: https://www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Bring Your Sequence. We'll Take You to IND.
items.description: With an exceptional track record in process and approvals, we merge quality and speed to get you to IND faster and better than anyone else.

items.title: Samsung Biologics | Regulatory Approvals from Global Agencies
Biopharmaceutical Process Characterization
items.description: Samsung Biologics presents its process development and characterization strategies required to support the commercial scale manufacturing of antibody therapeutics. In this webinar, we discuss how we develop a robust and scalable manufacturing process to support successful GMP manufacturing of biologics.

items.title: Fast & Efficient Downstream Process Development with Two-step Purification Platform
items.description: To reduce manufacturing costs and shorten the development timeline, the biotech industry is increasingly considering the application of a two-step purification scheme. The presentation describes the two-step purification platform for monoclonal antibody production achieved through Samsung's accumulated state-of-the-art technology.

items.title: Better Life: We are all in this together
items.description: At Samsung Biologics, one thing is clear - we are devoted to our shared vision to make "Better Life" for all humanity and deliver life-saving drugs to the world. We are in this together as One Team.

items.title: Through S-CHOice Cell Line & 2-Step Purification Platform
items.description:
Expediting the development timeline is directly related to obtaining IND clearance and starting the phase 1 study faster. This webinar describes how you can get to IND faster through our accelerated & high-performance proprietary cell line, S-CHOice. In addition, we present the combined benefit with S-CHOice and 2-step purification platform, which can further expedite the timeline and reduce manufacturing costs.
Our CDO services provide a full scope of development to help our clients reach IND from cell line development, process development, to non-clinical and clinical material manufacturing.

items.title: Project Management
items.description:
직무로 알아보는 삼성바이오로직스_1.PM편

Samsung Biologics Explained by Expert : 1.Project Management

If you want to know more about us, visit our website: https://www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.

items.title: Our Story: Driven. For Quality.
items.description: At our company, we put quality at the center of everything we do so not only to satisfy our clients but also to meet regulatory standards and ensure successful cGMP manufacturing operations. In our employee spotlight series, Sonya Lee breaks down why quality and process improvement are so vital to our work, and how they make up a core element of Samsung Biologics' #DrivenForLife mission.

items.title: [V-Log] 삼성바이오로직스 JOB 돋보기│공정/개발 : EPCV편
items.description: 신규 건설과 기존 공장 개보수에 있어 중추적인 가교 역할을 하는 EPCV(Engineering, Procurement, Construction, Validation)센터, 4공장 프로젝트 전반을 관리하고 있는 EPM팀의 하루를 소개합니다!

items.title: Samsung Biologics' Risk-Mitigated Biosafety Testing Webinar
items.description:
Samsung Biologics' extensive biosafety testing is crucial in assessing the safety of all biological products both for clients and patients. In this webinar, we'll discuss our unique biosafety testing strategy that can help mitigate risks to meet our clients' diversifying needs, and ensure on-time delivery without sacrificing proven quality.
Our CRO services provide a fully integrated on-site testing with great expertise in mycoplasma detection, adventitious virus testing and microbial testing services in benefit of well-established CMO services such as global standard QA service and 24/7 dedicated sample management group.

items.title: 2021 Samsung Biologics Annual General Meeting of Shareholders
items.description:
Samsung Biologics held the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders on March 19, 2021. Despite the global uncertainties with the ongoing pandemic, Samsung Biologics demonstrated outstanding operational excellence and business agility even during such extraordinary circumstances.

삼성바이오로직스는 지난 3월 19일, 제 10회 정기주주총회를 진행했습니다. 처음으로 전자투표를 도입한 이번 주주총회에는 총 100여명의 주주가 현장 및 온라인 중계로 참석한 가운데, ▲재무제표 승인과 ▲이사 보수한도 승인 안건이 모두 통과됐습니다. 존림 사장은 "삼성바이오로직스는 2021년 새로운 미래를 향해 글로벌 종합 바이오 기업으로 도약하기 위한 준비를 본격적으로 시작하려 한다"며 “ESG 투자 확대 등을 통해 건강하고 투명성 있는 지속가능경영 기업이 되겠다"고 밝혔습니다.

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.

items.title: [EN] BlueBetterFly "Shaping the Future of Pharma" Event (EU)
items.description: BlueBetterFly. An experience completely unique to Samsung Biologics that encompasses our pride and belief that one small change can have a big impact on the future. In our "Shaping the Future of Pharma" virtual networking forum, we hosted a roundtable discussion on the impact of COVID-19 and offered attendees the opportunity to connect and share insights with distinguished industry professionals in the EU on the future of biomanufacturing.

items.title: COVID-19 사태로 본 백신의 발전과정: 단백질, 핵산 그리고 바이러스
items.description: 최근 의약품은 증상을 유지시키거나 병을 치료하고 예방하기까지 우리 삶의 질을 크게 향상시켰습니다. WHO가 규명한 질병 X로 소추되는 현재의 COVID-19 팬데믹 상황에서 잠재적인 질병원을 찾는 것은 더욱 중요해졌습니다. 이를 위해서는 다양한 병원균에 맞서는 백신을 적시에 생산하는 민첩한 제조 능력과 유연한 플랫폼이 요구됩니다. 비록 전통적인 백신은 자연적인 병원균에 널리 쓰이지만, 안정성 검증에 시간이 소요됩니다. 지난 20년 간 재조합 단백질, 핵산, 그리고 바이러스 운반자 등 새로운 세대의 백신이 개발되었습니다. 인류의 안전이 최우선으로 재고되는 현 팬데믹 상황에서, 실험적인 접근은 전통적인 백신 플렛폼에서의 고질적인 이슈를 최소화하기 위한 첨단 기술이 동반되어야 합니다.

items.title: Samsung Biologics, the Most Reliable & Flexible CDMO Partner
items.description: As your most reliable and flexible CDMO partner, Samsung Biologics provides service offerings tailored to client and industry needs. In our enhanced & extended line of service, we leverage our business and sales efforts on small scale manufacturing and Asceptic filling in response to increasing demand. To find out more in detail, visit our website at www.samsungbiologics.com and get in touch.

items.title: Samsung Biologics at CPhI Worldwide 2019 | Highlights
items.description: Samsung Biologics attended CPhI Worldwide 2019 in Frankfurt. With a newly branded booth, Samsung Biologics showcased a virtual tour of our facility and held great sessions with our lineup of speakers on Continuous Manufacturing, Aseptic Filling, and CDMO Selection. We are so grateful to everyone who showed so much interest in our fully integrated custom-tailored services and End-to-End CDMO capability.

items.title: The Speed of Science (with ENG/KOR Subtitle)
items.description: In 2020, life was disrupted by the COVID-19 pandemic, and pharmaceutical companies faced the challenge of responding to a critical need for drug products globally. In this new #NaturesBuildingBlocks series, produced for us by BBC StoryWorks Commercial Productions, we show how as a CDMO, we rose to the challenge, matching the speed and scale of the pandemic to provide solutions and save lives.

items.title: Every Action Counts. We are Driven. For Life.
items.description:
삼성바이오로직스 임직원의 시선으로 담아낸, 삼성바이오로직스에서의 빛나는 하루!

매일 매일 누군가의 가능성과 희망, 그리고 소중한 내일을 만들어나간다는 건 어떤 의미일까요?

각자 하는 일은 모두 다르지만, 더 건강한 세상을 향해 한마음으로 나아가고 있는 삼성바이오로직스 임직원들의 하루를 소개합니다!

items.title: MSAT (Manufacturing Sciences and Technology)
items.description:
직무로 알아보는 삼성바이오로직스_2.공정기술편

Samsung Biologics Explained by Expert : 2.MSAT

If you want to know more about us, visit our website: https://www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: The Mission & Pride | Our Work Saves Lives
items.description: At Samsung Biologics, our shared mission of creating a better life for all humanity is a source of pride for our employees. We believe the work we do every single day matters — giving hope and making a better tomorrow.

items.title: 2020 삼성바이오로직스 글로벌 인턴 일과 엿보기
items.description:
삼성바이오로직스 글로벌 인턴은 어떤 하루를 보낼까?

학교생활과는 차원이 다른 회사에서의 생활, 
삼성바이오로직스에서 인턴생활의 경험을 생생하게 전달하는데요.

세계로 나아가는 BIO 인재가 되기 위한 글로벌 인턴의 하루를 만나BIO~

#삼성 #삼성바이오로직스 #글로벌인턴 #인턴의하루

items.title: 삼성바이오로직스 연하장
items.description: 그 어느 때보다 도전적이고 힘들었던 2020년을 되돌아보며, 올 한 해도 변함 없는 신뢰로 삼성바이오로직스와 함께해 주심에 감사드립니다. 다가 올 2021년에도 건승과 번영이 가득하시길 진심으로 기원하며 삼성바이오로직스와 함께 할 밝은 미래를 기대합니다.

items.title: Samsung Biologics Internship: Most Memorable Experiences
items.description: As an intern at Samsung Biologics, you'll gain real-world experience working alongside the most innovative thinkers and doers in the industry. From first impressions to memorable work experiences, hear from our interns as they share their unique stories and give advice for future applicants.

items.title: Post-COVID 19 Multi-Sourcing Trend in Biomanufacturing
items.description: In this PHARMAP 2021 virtual session, Regina Choi-Rivera, our Vice President of Drug Product, discussed how Samsung Biologics works closely with our clients and regulatory agencies to guarantee a resilient supply of raw materials and deliver pharmaceutical medicines on time through a multi-sourcing strategy.

items.title: BIO Digital 2020 | Economics of Stainless Steel and Single-Use Systems
items.description: With the development of single-use systems for biomanufacturing, the lingering question is “Which system is better; Single-use or stainless steel?” For anyone that has looked into this topic, the answer is not black and white. In this BIO Digital 2020 presentation, Justin Carbungco, Associate Director of sCMO at Samsung Biologics, focuses on the cost comparisons for stainless steel and single-use systems, and some considerations for companies that are looking into clinical and contract manufacturing.

items.title: Understanding the Alleged Samsung Biologics Accounting Issue [Episode 1]
items.description: This is the first of a three part video series created by Samsung Biologics to aid in the understanding of the facts regarding the alleged accounting issue.

items.title: The Future of Biopharma: Plant 4
items.description:
We are continuously pushing the boundaries to bring the success of our client's drug development and manufacturing journey. With our mission to build a healthier future for all, our new Plant 4 will merge innovative bioprocessing technology, automation, and digital capabilities with high-quality processes and multiple scales to ultimately accelerate our clients' life-saving treatments to patients in need.

#SamsungBiologics #CDMO #DrivenForLife

items.title: Samsung Biologics' Proprietary Cell Line Launch Ceremony
items.description:
As the world's leading CDMO company, Samsung Biologics has been making innovative moves. Today, we presented an official launch of Samsung Biologics’ proprietary cell line, a high-performing technology to start your successful therapeutics development journey.

Presenter : 
- Eun Young Yang (VP, Head of CDO Business Team)
- John Gill (Director, Head of Cell Line Development Part)

Contact: cdo.business@samsung.com

items.title: S-CHOice : Accelerated, High-performing Cell Line Development
items.description:
It can be a critical decision by any institution to
select the right host cell line; it can impact quality, cost of goods, and timeline. The presentation describes development studies of S-CHOice, Samsung’s proprietary cell line, which can help achieve high-quality products, adding value to Samsung’s one-stop CDMO capability.

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.

items.title: [KR] 3D Scientific Video about CDO Process Development and Capability
items.description: 삼성바이오로직스 CDO 서비스는 세포주 개발부터 임상 생산에 이르기까지 CDO 개발의 모든 단계에서 빠르고 더 나은 서비스를 제공합니다. 삼성바이오로직스 CDO 서비스를 통한 여러분의 바이오 의약품 개발 전 과정을 영상을 통해 확인해 보세요.

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.

items.title: Accelerated High-performing Platform Process of Monoclonal Antibody | PEGS Boston
items.description:
Accelerated High-performing Platform Process of Monoclonal Antibody: Upstream Optimization Case Study | PEGS Boston

Selecting the right CDMO partner is critical for any institution as the decision can impact product quality, cost and timeline. This presentation will delve into the CDO Upstream Process at Samsung Biologics which helps customers achieve high quality products with accelerated timelines.

items.title: What to consider in selecting the best cell line to accelerate the timeline to IND | BPI West
items.description: The start of a biologic’s developmental journey is represented with cell line development. During this exciting milestone, a suitable cell line must be selected for optimizing the remaining processes at the highest output. Where reducing time to market can determine a key factor for a successful business, selecting the right pathway from the start is critical to prevent any future risks. In this session, Samsung Biologics, as an integrated CDMO partner, will explain how we provide tailored solutions to suggest what to consider in selecting the best cell line to accelerate speed to market.

items.title: Operational Excellence for Client Satisfaction
items.description:
At Samsung Biologics, we have a shared mission to provide optimal solutions that are tailored for our clients' needs. As an award-winning CDMO partner with numerous proven regulatory approvals, we are committed to delivering operational excellence through our unique technology and innovation to optimize client satisfaction.

To learn more about our operational excellence, please follow our channel or visit us at www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: [V-Log] 삼성바이오로직스 JOB 돋보기│공정/개발 : DP공정편
items.description: 완제 의약품(DP: Drug Product)은 환자에게 최종적으로 투여될 수 있도록 일정한 제형으로 제조된 의약품으로, 완제 의약품을 생산하는 공정은 더욱 엄격하고 까다로운 관리가 필요합니다. DP공정팀에서는 어떤 일을 하는지, 나예지 프로의 하루를 통해 알아봅니다!

items.title: Our Story: Driven. For Innovation.
items.description: In our Samsung Bio Story series, we highlight not only the life-changing work our people do but also their personal experiences and diverse perspectives. As a project manager for tech transfer at Samsung Biologics, Doo Hyun Kevin Ra's role involves careful planning, evaluation, and a bit of ingenuity to meet project timelines efficiently while maintaining high quality. Hear about how he and his colleagues shorten the tech transfer process from six to three months, and what being "Driven. For Innovation." means to him.

items.title: Our Story: Driven. For Digitalization.
items.description:
During the pandemic, on-site regulatory and client inspections and tours became difficult to conduct. To solve this challenge, Seongil Choi, the head of IT-EDM, and his team implemented the Live Virtual Tour (LVT) solution to allow for global clients to access our facilities via a live-streaming platform and take a scheduled tour, audit, or inspection at their convenience. In this month's BIO Story segment, hear how Seongil and his team successfully utilized LVT and what "Driven. For Life." means to him.

#SamsungBiologics #CDMO #Digitalization #DrivenForLife #OurBIOStory

items.title: Our Business Continuity Management System
items.description: At a time where crisis management plays an increasingly greater role worldwide, we put client satisfaction as a top priority. Samsung Biologics has been operating under the Business Continuity Management System (BCMS) to act swiftly against unexpected incidents that may potentially disrupt our business. Through our analysis, design, implementation, and validation process, we are able to detect the risk of potential business disruptions, reduce supply interruptions, and operate in an efficient manner to become the most trusted partner to our clients.

items.title: BIO Digital 2020 | Key Considerations for a Successful Technology Transfer
items.description: Samsung Biologics is a fully integrated contract service provider offering services from mammalian cell line and process development to cGMP clinical and commercial manufacturing (DS/DP) and biosafety testing services—all from a single location. With client satisfaction as our main priority, we provide highly tailored solutions using the most advanced technology to deliver product efficiently and effectively. Learn more about what we offer as well as how our multi-scale manufacturing facilities provide us with the flexibility to accommodate our clients' needs.

items.title: Samsung Biologics BOD Interview | John Rim
items.description: John Rim, EVP at Samsung Biologics, has been newly elected as an inside director at the company's 2020 Annual General Shareholder's Meeting. With rich experience and expertise from the global biopharma industry, John talks about market trends, key strengths, and the future of Samsung Biologics.

items.title: Introducing Samsung Biologics Plant 4, the Super Plant
items.description:
Following the recent groundbreaking for Plant 4, dubbed the "Super Plant," the Virtual Showroom is now officially open to the public.

This dedicated page will provide real-time construction updates of the new facility as well as an in-depth introduction to specs and features Plant 4 will offer upon completion. Plant 4 will be the most ambitious and innovative project to date, breaking its own record as the world's largest and most innovative biomanufacturing facility.

Please visit our Plant 4 Virtual Showroom and learn more.

http://www.samsungbiologics.com/plant4

items.title: Our Mission | Producing Drugs of the Highest Quality
items.description: Over 100 million people are carrying a form of cancer worldwide, and 1 in 6 deaths occurs due to cancer globally. This World Cancer Day reminds us of our mission to bring Better Life for those suffering from this challenging disease. From cell-line development to the manufacture of biological therapies, we are pushing the boundaries of science and innovation to help our clients discover greater solutions to life-sustaining treatment.

items.title: BIO Digital 2021 | The Opening Remarks in an Exclusive Keynote Session
items.description:
Despite the fact that the global pandemic has pushed us apart in distance, it has only brought us closer together through collaboration and speed unprecedented in this industry. With the sustainability and growth of the biotech industry in mind, our vision has been, and always will be, to achieve better life through biomedicines. 

Watch now to hear more about our mission and future areas of expansion.

items.title: Accelerating Excellence, because your time saves lives
items.description:
Developing a molecule to a new medicine is a lengthy, complex, and costly process. At Samsung Biologics, we are committed to offering high-quality products right on time because we believe time saves the lives of patients all around the globe. With our unique manufacturing capabilities and operational excellence, we promise to bring the best and provide "Better Life" for humanity.

To learn more about our commitment as a CMO partner, please visit us at www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Our Story: Driven. For Growth.
items.description:
From internship to full-time employment, we believe in fostering an environment where our employees can continuously develop and grow at all levels and stages of their career. In this month's Samsung BIO Story, Soowan Park, Senior Specialist in the Global Recruiting Group, shares how her the hands-on internship experience broadened her skillset and helped discover her career path.

#SamsungBiologics #CDMO #DrivenForLife #SamsungBIOStory

items.title: 3D Scientific Video about CDO Process Development and Capability
items.description: From the early stages of cell line development to clinical production, Samsung Biologics' CDO team of experts offers dedicated and flexible services for our clients at every stage of their needs. Watch the video to learn more about the journey a molecule takes to get to the market faster and better with our CDO services. We promise the best.

items.title: Plant 4 Construction update I Piling & Ground Leveling work
items.description: Since Samsung Biologics broke ground on Plant 4, the Super Plant, last year, our people have been working tirelessly to build the world's largest and most innovative bio-manufacturing facility to date. As the first phase in construction, we have meticulously undergone 'Piling & Ground Leveling' work to prepare the ground for our newest plant to strongly stand on. Check out the timelapse video of our Plant 4 site and stay tuned for more updates to come.

items.title: [Highlights] CPhI WW 2019 | Speaker Session #1 | Drug Product
items.description: This presentation describes Samsung Biologics’ experience with Drug Product projects in clinical and commercial stages, with clientele ranging from virtual companies to big pharma. Within five years, Samsung Biologics has evolved from a single filling line start-up to an emerging competitor in the DP CDMO landscape. Focused on reinventing the customer experience, Samsung Biologics is determined to deliver where others cannot. Four case studies will be presented illustrating the adaptability and innovation Samsung Biologics has employed to successfully deliver a quality product and maintain their clients’ supply chains consistently and reliably

items.title: 코리아 소사이어티 프레지던트 인터뷰 | 삼성바이오로직스 존림 사장
items.description: 삼성바이오로직스의 존림 사장은 한미 상호간의 이해와 협력 증진을 목표로 하는 코리아 소사이어티의 토머스 번 회장과 대담을 진행하였습니다. 한미 양국의 기업 리더들과 경제계 전문가들을 대상으로 한미간 경제, 금융 및 비즈니스에 관현 현안을 짚어보는 ‘President’s Interview Series’ 프로그램을 통해 존림 사장은 글로벌 제약사에서 쌓은 경영 리더십과 바이오제약 산업의 현황과 전망, 그리고 삼성바이오로직스의 mRNA 백신 생산 역량 및 글로벌 팬데믹 속 삼성바이오로직스의 역할과 향후 성장 비전 등을 나눴습니다. 자세한 내용은 영상을 통해 확인해 보세요.

items.title: 2020 Samsung Biologics Annual General Meeting of Shareholders
items.description:
On March 20th of 2020, Samsung Biologics held the Annual General Meeting
of Shareholders and pledged to innovate its management to build a Super Value Company. Please visit our website to look at the reference materials, and further learn about our service offerings.

items.title: Understanding the Alleged Samsung Biologics Accounting Issue [Episode 2]
items.description: This is the second of a three part video series created by Samsung Biologics to aid in the understanding of the facts regarding the alleged accounting issue.

items.title: Samsung Biologics | Digital Transformation
items.description: At Samsung Biologics, we believe embracing digital transformation is key to demonstrating transparent and agile business operations. Watch the video and learn from Dong Soo Kang, Head of Biosafety Testing Services at Samsung Biologics, on how our CRO team defines and leverages digital solutions to enhance client satisfaction and creates more transparency and quality across all value chain.

items.title: [V-Log] 삼성바이오로직스 JOB 돋보기│공정/개발 : Biosafety Testing편
items.description: 단 하나의 마이코플라스마&바이러스도 용서할 수 없다! 환자들의 안전을 위해 생물안전시험을 수행하는 Biosafety Testing Group의 김보은 프로. 엄청난 꼼꼼함이 요구되는 Biosafety Test 업무지만 유쾌한 동료들과 함께 든든히 해나가는 김보은 프로의 하루를 소개합니다.

items.title: [KR] BlueBetterFly "Shaping the Future of Pharma" Event (US)
items.description: BlueBetterFly. 하나의 작은 날개짓이 미래의 큰 변화를 가져올 수 있다는 우리의 신념을 보여주는 'Shaping the Future of Pharma' 버추얼 네트워킹 포럼에서는 삼성바이오로직스와 함께 제약 바이오 업계의 주요 전문가들의 COVID-19 관련 견해를 청취할 수 있는 기회를 가졌습니다. 영상을 통해 확인 바랍니다.

items.title: Samsung Biologics TRIVIA | 삼성바이오로직스 이모저모 알아보기
items.description: 소소한 지식이나 상식을 뜻하는 TRIVIA! 삼성바이오로직스의 소소한 지식을 임직원들에게 물어보았습니다. 영상 속 퀴즈를 통해 작지만 중요한 삼성바이오로직스의 이모저모에 대해 함께 알아보실 수 있습니다.

items.title: Our Story: Driven. For a Better Tomorrow.
items.description:
Starting from the ground up, we owe our success to the people who put their passion into practice every day and strive to make an impact in the world by taking on new challenges. In honor of our 10th Anniversary, we brought together two employees—Byul Choi who has been with Samsung Biologics since the beginning and Yeonha Kim who newly joined—to reflect on their experiences, how far we’ve come as a company, and where they envision us going in the next decade. Discover what “Driven. For Life.” means to them at such a significant time.

#SamsungBiologics #CDMO #DrivenForLife

items.title: Bio Smart Board
items.description:
What’s the most attractive part of Samsung Biologics? Samsung Biologics promotes active communication! We induce the best results through active communication regardless of departments and positions. For example? Samsung Biologics has many channels to enhance communication among employees from various backgrounds. For example, an annual Bio Mini Olympic, Knowledge Concert, and Healing Concert. Through various cultural events Samsung Biologics strives to bring smiles to our employees. What benefits does Samsung Biologics provides to the employees? Samsung Biologics operates shuttle buses and dormitory for employees commuting from distant areas. It also operates a kindergarten for employees who have children. And it cares for employees’ health via a fitness center, hospital and pharmacy in the building. Would you recommend Samsung Biologics for career? Samsung Biologics supports career growth, happy company life, and strives to be the world’s best CMO company. I strongly recommend Samsung Biologics to you.

If you want to know more about Samsung Biologics, visit our website: https://www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Our Story: Driven. For Product Integrity.
items.description:
As a vital part of the biopharma manufacturing process, cold chain logistics ensures that biomedicines are kept within specified temperature parameters in order to maintain its safety and effectiveness. In this month's Samsung BIO Story, Changgeun Lee, a Senior Specialist in Logistics, explains how our tightly managed, high-quality cold storage preserves the integrity of these critical products.

#SamsungBiologics #CDMO #DrivenForLife #ColdChain

items.title: Get to IND Faster: Accelerated & High Performance Cell Line Development
items.description: Expediting development timeline is directly related to obtaining IND clearance and starting phase 1 study faster. This webinar describes how you can get to IND faster through our accelerated & high performance proprietary cell line. We will present our 3 month cell line development timeline and high quality cell line with outstanding productivity, the Faster & Better approach which can be applicable to your molecule's development path to IND.

items.title: Thomas Gervais - Principal Scientist in the MSAT at Samsung Biologics
items.description: Thomas Gervais leads the Downstream group in the MSAT(Manufacturing Sciences and Technology) team at Samsung Biologics. Check out his interview, and find out more about working at Samsung Biologics on our Careers page at https://www.samsungbiologics.com

items.title: Samsung Biologics | Drug Product Manufacturing
items.description: Over the years, Samsung Biologics has been dedicated to expanding and advancing our capabilities to provide you with reliable solutions to your product supply chain needs. That's why we offer competitive drug product manufacturing with on-time, in-full delivery. From aseptic filling and lyophilization to regulatory support, discover all the clinical and commercial capabilities we have to offer.

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.

items.title: Private video
items.description: This video is private.
